name: Excel Course on Permutations Combinations, Binomial Theorem & Probability
description: In this course, Vineet Loomba will provide in-depth knowledge of permutations combinations, binomial theorem and probability. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for IIT JEE. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. The course will be completed in approximately 19 days which comprises 15 classes with a duration of 90 minutes each. The course will be conducted in Hindi and notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Dearrangements and multinomial Theorem & Doubt Clearing
Binomial Theorem Introduction and Binomial Coefficients
Properties of binomial Coefficient and Greatest Term
Miscellaneous Series & Binomial theorem for any index
Multinomial Theorem & Inclusion Exclusion Principle & Doubt Clearing
Classical Probability and Algebra of Events
Bayes Theorem and Total Probability Theorem
Random Variable, Bernoulli Trials, Binomial Distribution
Geometrical Probability, Statistical Tree Diagram & Doubt Clearing

author.bio: A game-changer in Mathematics, produced 100 percentilers in 2021/2022/2023, his courses are regarded as the Benchmark for IIT JEE aspirants.
